title: Cristian Javier, Framber Valdez and the Astros Pitching Factory
description: Cristian Javier and Framber Valdez were never considered top prospects, but the young starting pitchers are leading the way for the Astros in the World Series.
dc:creator: Tyler Kepner
media:description: Cristian Javier was 11-9 with a 2.54 E.R.A. during the regular season. He has won consecutive postseason starts, the second of which was part of a combined no-hitter.
